caption: The protagonist attends the wedding of Mary and his friend. At the wedding, the protagonist encounters Mary's ex-husband and his friend Major Shultz. A conversation between the protagonist and the ex-husband hints that the latter is not a trustworthy person, and the protagonist might uncover some of his secrets. Highlights include: the protagonist attends the wedding of Mary and his friend; encounters Mary's ex-husband and his friend Major Shultz; the dialogue between the protagonist and the ex-husband implies the latter is untrustworthy; the protagonist might find out some of his secrets; the ex-husband mentions a bottle of malicious liquor, which the protagonist might investigate; Major Shultz often mentions the protagonist, though the protagonist has never heard of him; Major Shultz may have some secrets; the protagonist and his friend share a profound friendship; his friend's military life suits him well; the protagonist might uncover more information about the ex-husband and Major Shultz.
